topics.body: Speaking of the Pokemon Adventures manga, that series handles N waaaaaaaaaaaaay differently. In the games and by extension the anime N is a well intentioned but naive sort with a gentle heart. All he wants is for Pokemon to be free. In the manga however he's a piece of shit. One of the FIRST things he does is he throws White out of the Ferris Wheel. AT THE TOP. He tries to fucking murder a chick!

topics.body:
Oh *FUCK!* I can't believe it! I mean, it was obvious actually but it was too obvious that I didn't think that he would actually do it!

The author of Fairy Tail has finally revealed who END is [spoiler]and it was Natsu Dragneel of all people[/spoiler]! Seriously, it was so obvious and so many headcanons suggested so but due to how obvious it is, I thought it was just a joke! But I was wrong... So wrong...
